title: Science Teacher Training Program Utilizing Digital Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in teaching science subjects
context.additional_context: Strengthening Science Curriculum Design Capabilities Using Digital Platforms in Smartphone-Centric, Technologically Limited Environments

learning_goals: Learners can design science curriculum-tailored lessons using digital platforms with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design and implement digital tool-based collaborative learning activities, achieving peer evaluation scores of 3.5/5 or higher
Learners can complete a science experiment virtual simulation design project using smartphone-based platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
